department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Upgrade Kaba 710 model locksets and software
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 17, 2022 by 2:00 PMEDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PMEDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for the supply of parts to upgrade Kaba 710 model locksets and software. The 330 existing Kaba 710 model locksets will be upgraded to 79 series model. Onsite training is also required.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement for Replacement Locksets
#### Key Details
* **Title:** Replacement Locksets (W6837-224747)
* **Reference Number:** WS3617418381-Doc3664197368
* **Publication Date:** September 27, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 17, 2022, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

#### Call for Proposals
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the supply and upgrade of Kaba 710 model locksets and associated software.

#### Key Requirements
* Supply 330 existing Kaba 710 model locksets with upgrades to the 79 series model
* Provide onsite training for the upgraded locksets

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Regions of Delivery
The locksets will be delivered to Kingston, Ontario, Canada.

#### Contact Information
For further information or to submit a proposal, please contact:
Yvonne Ocheoha (SPAC/PSPC)
yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL
The notice is available on the Ariba Discovery website.
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14218239?extsite=MTQyMTgyMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
